Description: OPEN HOUSE THURSDAY 8/10 FROM 5-6pm - This charming 1 bedroom 1 bath residence blends contemporary elegance with timeless charm. Step inside to discover a thoughtfully designed interior with an open-concept layout, hardwood floors, and chic crown moldings. The gourmet kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops, perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Comfort is ensured with central air, in-unit laundry, and ample storage space. Enjoy nearby cafes, restaurants, and shops for a truly vibrant city experience. Easy access to transportation makes commuting a breeze.
